id: scenario-social-medium-child-scenarios-affinity-network-child learns from elder mentor in safe context
title: Child learns from elder mentor in safe context
description: Child learns from elder mentor in safe context
content:
Scenario: Child learns from elder mentor in safe context
    Given Emma has been active in the manga community for 6 months
    And she shows dedication and growing skill
    When an elder community artist offers mentorship
    Then the matching agent verifies the elder's background and trustworthiness
    And the mentorship is structured with appropriate boundaries
    And Emma's parents are notified and can approve the arrangement
    And mentorship interactions are visible to community moderators
    And Emma receives valuable guidance in a safe learning relationship
